name: SpaceFluff
description:
A game where you have to try to bounce as many times as possible with in the given time frame. 

Controls: WASD for directional rotation, Space Key to dash, and ESC to escape. 

You have 3 chances to dash, and with in that chance you can pick up the sparkles to refill the amount of times you can accelerate, and bounce off the wall as many times as possible.

Avoid the Blackholes that will drag you in and fly you off sight.
